fields.Title: VILLAGE / POSSE 2
fields.Description: the defence part with the big defence hub etc

fields.Title: Cuno: ""I'll make it tight, pig. Don't wor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll make it tight, pig. Don't worry, the Cunn is on it."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He gulps, overcome with awe."
fields.Dialogue Text: He gulps, overcome with awe.

fields.Title: You: ""That's right, it was a massacre. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right, it was a massacre. They got what was coming to them."

fields.Title: You: "Gulp."
fields.Dialogue Text: Gulp.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not as far as I could see. There w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not as far as I could see. There were other things there, though..." He turns to you.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""There are species of bees that, un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are species of bees that, under the influence of kairomones, take wasp larvae to their hives. Ants do the same with aphids thinking they're..." he stops. "Do you think this is how it's stayed hidden?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- it's very okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- it's very okay."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Pig, what the fuck is wrong with y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pig, what the fuck is wrong with you?! Why you choking? Lay it on them! We have it!"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Of course. There *is* no motive......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. There *is* no motive..." He sighs.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Also -- we have a sniper's nest wi..."]
Jean Vicquemare: ""*Masterpiece*..." He rolls his eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Masterpiece*..." He rolls his eyes. "Get over yourself, Harry -- I can still smell the booze on the wind."

fields.Title: Endurance: "The iron smell of blood rises to yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The iron smell of blood rises to your mouth.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""You know, Harry -- if I may interr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, Harry -- if I may interrupt -- it would help if you had *evidence*. Any proof -- and I'd play ball here. The PR potential would be quite something for the RCM."
fields.Alternate1: "You know, Harry -- if I may interrupt again -- it would help if you had *evidence*. Any proof -- and I'd play ball here. The PR potential would be quite something for the RCM."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Move on. Don't gloat."
fields.Dialogue Text: Move on. Don't gloat.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Cool. To me it sounds like you got..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool. To me it sounds like you got played by Evrart Claire. Duped -- for the hundredth time."
fields.Alternate1: "Cool. To me it sounds like you got played by Evrart Claire. And it's true -- you *are* his little peone."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes, we can *see* the jacket. Fuck..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, we can *see* the jacket. Fuck the world. Fuck police duty. Fuck Jean Vicquemare -- that's what it says to me. Fuck me. We've been through this."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes, we can see the jacket. 'Hey e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, we can see the jacket. 'Hey everybody -- I'm working undercover in a *hard fetish gang*. I don't care about anyone or anything.' We've been through this."

fields.Title: You: ""I also solved the case. It's *solv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I also solved the case. It's *solved*. All of it."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay, he did *something*...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, he did *something*..."

fields.Title: You: ""There was also a dead man -- on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was also a dead man -- on the boardwalk. A missing person I found."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "It doesn't look like the lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It doesn't look like the lieutenant wishes you to push this angle further.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""No." He does not take the order. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." He does not take the order. "Cuno's going *all in*."

fields.Title: You: ""Cuno -- Shush.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno -- Shush."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""No." He stops you. "You've explain..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." He stops you. "You've explained enough, pig. Cuno takes care of this shit now."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. Go home or fuck off.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Go home or fuck off."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, spin that real shit, pig. Mu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, spin that real shit, pig. Murder weapon, big boy shit."
fields.Alternate1: "Mmmhm." He nods, looking Vicquemare in the eye. "Murder weapon, big boy shit. My piggo tried to show you, but you shit the bed."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's genuinely alarmed now."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's genuinely alarmed now.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Who? Who got what was coming to th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who? Who got what was coming to them? The civilians? Lieutenant Kitsuragi? Why are you even *here* after he got shot? What else could you possibly fuck up?"

fields.Title: Authority: "Something that proves you haven't c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something that proves you haven't completely lost it. Something *solid*. You've *done* things. Good things. List those.

fields.Title: Logic: "That makes sense, yes."
fields.Dialogue Text: That makes sense, yes.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I tried to... but I only got a blu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I tried to... but I only got a blur."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Stop squealing on yourself. Cuno *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stop squealing on yourself. Cuno *needs* to get out of this shithole." He turns to Vicquemare. "Pig's talking whack to impress you. It didn't go down like that. He done good. Tell them!"

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Of course. Excuse me. I just thoug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. Excuse me. I just thought it was noteworthy."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay-okay..." He rubs his temples...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay-okay..." He rubs his temples. "Will he confess? To *prosecution*? No phasmid weirdness, just straight up confess?"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Klaasje -- as in the suspect Lieut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Klaasje -- as in the suspect Lieutenant Kitsuragi brought in? I've read his reports -- don't fuck with me."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Oh, it's *way* more than that."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, it's *way* more than that.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And none of this can hide the smel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And none of this can hide the smell of booze on the wind." He buttons his jacket.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Judit Minot: ""Jean, maybe..." She stops and sigh..."]
Trant Heidelstam: ""Some kind of a... what were they c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some kind of a... what were they called? A bower? Yes. Things collected for a mating display. This would indicate a male. But... I don't know of *insects* displaying bowery behaviour."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Literal *cryptozoologists* are inv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Literal *cryptozoologists* are involved? That's it. No more phasmid-talk. There's no PR-value in delirium tremens."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""It will NEVER be seen again! It wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It will NEVER be seen again! It wasn't seen for a *hundred* years. Fuck Cuno and let's all pretend there was no miracle. We don't need a giant insect, everything is so *good* without it in this fuck-hole..." He looks around.

fields.Title: Volition: "The sheer willpower in him MUST be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sheer willpower in him MUST be making some dent in their incredulity. Some part of them must be thinking...

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What? Hand Claire the terminal?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What? Hand Claire the terminal?"

fields.Title: You: ""Eat the pigs!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eat the pigs!"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It doesn't matter how I know about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't matter how I know about *Al Gul*. What matters is -- you're Evrart Claire's messenger now. A *Union man*, as he calls it. He's a *mob boss*, did you know?"
fields.Alternate1: "It doesn't matter how I know about *Al Gul*. What matters is -- you're Evrart Claire's peone now. Just as I said. He's a *mob boss*, did you know?"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Agreed.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Agreed."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""The body was transported to Precin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The body was transported to Precinct 41. Our morgue. I had Tillbrook and Mollins take care of funeral arrangements and family-stuff."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Of course." She turns to Vicquemar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She turns to Vicquemare. "Call it community outreach, right?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also a Mazovi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Odder still -- he is also a Mazovian socio-economist, who believes in liquidating the ruling class. How he reconciles these two points of view, I do not know -- but he is *vocal* on both of them."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He apprehended a straggler who sta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He apprehended a straggler who stayed hidden for fifty years, ever since the Revolution; who's probably committed other murders over those years..." He pauses. "Oh -- and he also discovered a new species."

fields.Title: You: ""The curse turned out to be possibl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The curse turned out to be possibly entroponetical. Part of my larger investigation -- into Martinaise itself."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yo -- Imma stop you right there, f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yo -- Imma stop you right there, fuck-face. It's Cuno-time."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- some fucked up grandpa did..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- some fucked up grandpa did it. Fuckin' grandpa in the woods or some shit. Old shit. Cuno doesn't know about that. Look -- the REAL shit here is..."

fields.Title: Composure: "His hand is shaking with rage and e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His hand is shaking with rage and excitement.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't know. I zoned out. Harry -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. I zoned out. Harry --" He turns you. "Did you just pick up some island bum and pin it on him?"

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Actually, you know -- this would i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, you know -- this would indicate it was a male. This is far from anything in my field, but I think such nests are called 'bowers'. They are for attracting mates."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Interesting... Then it is *especia..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Interesting... Then it is *especially* vulnerable to disease. A single strain of bacteria could wipe out the entire species. We're *probably* talking conservation efforts here..." He looks around, quickly assessing the coast.

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""This would really help with some o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This would really help with some of the... *problems* we've been having."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""We can still work 'Cop Discovers N..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can still work 'Cop Discovers New Species' in there. I know a good guy in La Majeste. But only *after* the École Supérieure people find it. This *cannot* be done by fringe people."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What was that?" He cups his ear --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was that?" He cups his ear -- the wind blows. "It sounded like you set up a night club in the church."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I'm 100% sure it didn't *turn out*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm 100% sure it didn't *turn out* to be that. You know, cut the amateur entroponetic two-millimetre-hole shit -- this isn't Paradox B. We're a police force."

fields.Title: You: ""The state he's in now? I don't kno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The state he's in now? I don't know. But *we* got a confession -- he confessed to us."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, detective -- we *have* a motiv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, detective -- we *have* a motive..." He gestures for you to speak up.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Possibly* induced," he corrects y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Possibly* induced," he corrects you. "But even without that -- this man spent fifty years on the islands in the bay. In solitude. Loathing what Revachol has become. There's plenty for prosecution to pick from in terms of motive."

fields.Title: You: ""It's more than that -- a perfect f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's more than that -- a perfect folding mechanism. Like the phasmid."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Way, *way* more."
fields.Dialogue Text: Way, *way* more.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It doesn't hide the smell of booze..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't hide the smell of booze on the wind either." He buttons his jacket.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What?" He lowers his voice. "On be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?" He lowers his voice. "On behalf of..."

fields.Title: You: ""The fatso.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fatso."

fields.Title: You: ""It was an accident.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was an accident."

fields.Title: You: ""I masterminded a solution to an un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I masterminded a solution to an unsolvable problem."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Great. Thanks." He turns to you. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great. Thanks." He turns to you. "You snorted the drugs. I know you did. Fuck it. It's all right. I mean -- honestly. *Anything* but the drink."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear gasps beneath the howling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear gasps beneath the howling of the wind.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "In his mind he's already planning a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In his mind he's already planning a nature reserve and *knows a good guy* for that.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "It could maybe roll it? Like a dung..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It could maybe roll it? Like a dung-beetle.

fields.Title: Authority: "He thinks of apologizing but decide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He thinks of apologizing but decides against it.

fields.Title: You: "That's not a good idea."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's not a good idea.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The RCM consists of policemen of t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The RCM consists of policemen of the state that *is*. So -- a little discrepancy there." He turns back to Vicquemare.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's worrying. Especially in light..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's worrying. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a fascist. A far-right woman-hater and, of course, also into race-stuff. Which -- for a police officer --" He shakes his head. "Not good."

fields.Title: You: ""The killer -- Lilianovich Dros --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The killer -- Lilianovich Dros -- we have a strong motive for him."
fields.Alternate1: "The killer -- Lilianovich Dros -- I have a strong motive for him."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "'Cut it out' is indeed what he is t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Cut it out' is indeed what he is thinking.

fields.Title: You: ""Uh -- big boy shit?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh -- big boy shit?"

fields.Title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: behold, a passport."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("hat_t500") == false  and  CheckItem("deserter_scope") == false  and  CheckItem("klaasje_passport") == true

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Why are you not fucking shitting y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are you not fucking shitting yourselves -- what's wrong?!" He glares at the officers standing silently in the rain. The water is coming down hard, washing the concrete...

fields.Title: Logic: "It's not going well. Present someth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not going well. Present something now -- something sane and clear. Make your case.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You went in drunk and you got your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You went in drunk and you got yourself shot -- and others killed." He sighs, then continues more calmly: "Why are you even *here* after Kitsuragi got shot?"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This is *not* a joke. We *will* du..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is *not* a joke. We *will* dump you, Harry. We will leave you here -- and you'll be just another bum on the coast. Take this as your *trial*. Stop fucking around."

fields.Title: Volition: "Stop taking this abuse. YOU. SOLVED..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop taking this abuse. YOU. SOLVED. THE. CASE.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Of course. As I said, I'm only gue..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. As I said, I'm only guessing. *I* didn't see it." He pauses, turning something over in his head. "It must be robust, if it can move a whole helmet with its limbs..."
fields.Alternate1: "Of course. As I said, I'm only guessing. *I* didn't see it. It must be robust, if it can move *that*," he points to the helmet you're wearing, "with its limbs."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: "He nods. "At that size, this creatu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods. "At that size, this creature would have a lot of surface area to put neurons into. It's basic geometry."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Of course. I'm getting ahead of my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. I'm getting ahead of myself. Stick insects have primitive nervous systems. Still -- this creature would have a lot of surface area to put neurons into..."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Incredible..." he repeats, turning..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Incredible..." he repeats, turning to Vicquemare. "It's a toughie that you don't have a photo. This would look very, very flashy in the papers. None of it says *vigilante murderers* to me at all. Great PR."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait -- when did you do this?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- when did you do this?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Get the kid in line. You could use..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get the kid in line. You could use his help here.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, suit. Check this shit out --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, suit. Check this shit out -- the merc was bangin' some chick he wanted to bang. So he shot him. Chick's called Klaasje."

fields.Title: You: ""He's a trained sniper. The weapon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used is more than capable of making the shot."
fields.Alternate1: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used -- the ballistics match."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Jealousy... I thought this Liliano..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jealousy... I thought this Lilianovich was an old man. To have been hiding for fifty years... seventy-something?"

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "God dammit, doesn't it ever *leave*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: God dammit, doesn't it ever *leave*?! It *is* there! Like, in your bones or something...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "It's just a little celebration."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's just a little celebration.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS on the island."

fields.Title: You: ""It was completely white on the ins..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was completely white on the inside, but brown and beige on the outside. Like reeds."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's a scope. From a gun. Nothing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a scope. From a gun. Nothing about this even *remotely* proves the existence of a giant insect. Here's my theory, Harry."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Plants turning into bugs *is* a ty..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Plants turning into bugs *is* a typical hallucination. Arche-typical even, dating back to many ancient tribal societies."

fields.Title: You: "Just nod."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just nod.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""For the sake of political neutrali..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For the sake of political neutrality I would like to *not* partake in anything Union-related."

fields.Title: You: ""I just told some people some thing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just told some people some things. No big deal. Things are calmer now."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""God... Calm down, Jean.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "God... Calm down, Jean."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Talked? Okay. What you're giving u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Talked? Okay. What you're giving us -- it's not news. It's not proof. Or an observation. It's a cryptozoological factoid. You can get it from Paradox B, Aquarius, any *mystery* station. Here's *my* theory."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait, it's better if I..." he says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, it's better if I..." he says in a lowered voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well..." A cold gust of wind. He p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well..." A cold gust of wind. He pulls up his collar. "The drinking, the lost gun, also losing his badge -- that's all true. *And* he's been drinking on the job."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also an ultra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Odder still -- he is also an ultraliberal 'hustler' who is always..." The lieutenant pinches the root of his nose. "*On the grind.* How he reconciles these two points of view, I do not know -- but he is vocal about both of them."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Other than that one time, he has t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Other than that one time, he has tirelessly worked on the case. And he solved it. We have a confession, a murder weapon, *and* the perpetrator -- locked on the island right now, awaiting transportation."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""A... new species?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A... new species?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A colossal stick insect. It was on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A colossal stick insect. It was on the island, camouflaged as the reeds. It... unfolded from the reeds. I think we may be dealing with the Insulindian phasmid."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""So it *is* connected...?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So it *is* connected...?"

fields.Title: You: ""Also, the phasmid was female. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Also, the phasmid was female. The reeds are its nest."

fields.Title: You: ""The previous head of the Débardeur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The previous head of the Débardeurs' Union was assassinated by *our* killer."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, big shit." He nods and cross..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, big shit." He nods and crosses his arms, regally. "Now listen up suit-fuck. You're gonna shit yourself, because it's gonna get wacko-natural."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Lieutenant. Really... I...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant. Really... I..."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, big shit. We taking them *al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, big shit. We taking them *all* down. We cleaning this shit up." He nods and crosses his arms, regally. "Now listen up suit-fuck. You're gonna shit yourself, because it's gonna get wacko-natural."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait. It's *not* going to get that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait. It's *not* going to get that. Let me..."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What?!" he scoffs, then turns to y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?!" he scoffs, then turns to you. "Sorry, kid, me and Harry need to..."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Without it..." He shakes his head."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Without it..." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""When you were out.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "When you were out."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, and the club is called *Disc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, and the club is called *Disco Elysium*."
fields.Alternate1: "Yeah, and the club is called *No Truce with the Furies*."
fields.Alternate2: "Yeah, and the club is called *Revachol West*."
fields.Alternate3: "Yeah, and the club is called *The Return*."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What was that?" He cups his ear --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was that?" He cups his ear -- the wind blows. "It sounded like you set up a night club in the church."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a *fridge* we needed. An..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was a *fridge* we needed. And a possible witness. He was just chasing a lead and ended up advising a local shopkeeper -- it was okay."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""The custom started in Graad, where..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The custom started in Graad, where they have patronyms: Krasovich, Larsovich, etc. The revolutionaries saw this as a chauvinist atavism so they used matronyms, derived from the mother's name, instead."

fields.Title: You: ""Cuno. Keep your head in the game.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno. Keep your head in the game."

fields.Title: You: ""He's a trained sniper. The weapon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used is more than capable of making the shot."
fields.Alternate1: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used -- the ballistics match."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And it worked? He got a war going?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And it worked? He got a war going?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It's *way* more than that."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's *way* more than that.

fields.Title: You: ""It's *way* more than that. It will..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's *way* more than that. It will win me Dora back."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Perfect folding mechanism*..." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Perfect folding mechanism*..." He rolls his eyes. "Get over yourself, Harry -- I can still smell the booze on the wind."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh yeah, it's going to get wacko-n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yeah, it's going to get wacko-natural. Tell him."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "They're not going to consider more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They're not going to consider more than one piece of evidence -- choose wisely.

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe I got too deep into what the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe I got too deep into what the cryptozoologists were telling me..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He didn't quite *solve* it -- he c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He didn't quite *solve* it -- he cross-pollinated information between the company rep and Evrart. Until the rep came to see that the Union desires war. At which point Mrs. Messier decided to..." He shrugs.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "There is *no* challenging the fury..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is *no* challenging the fury the kid is about to unleash.

fields.Title: You: ""I moved information between the co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I moved information between the company rep and Evrart. Until the rep came to see that the Union *wants* war. At which point Mrs. Messier decided to go."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did everything he could," the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He did everything he could," the lieutenant interrupts him. "*We* did everything we could. The company hired unvetted mercenaries. Lieutenant Du Bois got between them and the locals."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And then there's the motor carriag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And then there's the motor carriage in the sea -- something I was *not* present for..." He breathes in sharply. "But -- despite all this -- he is a great detective. One of the best I've seen, in fact."
fields.Alternate1: "And then there's the motor carriage in the sea, and the drugs, of course, some kind of anti-radiation drug he uses to induce visions..." He breathes in sharply. "But -- despite all this -- he is a great detective. One of the best I've seen, in fact."
fields.Alternate2: "And then there's the motor carriage in the sea, and the drugs, of course -- amphetamine, mostly..." He breathes in sharply. "But -- despite all this -- he is a great detective. One of the best I've seen, in fact."
fields.Alternate3: "And then there's the motor carriage in the sea, and the constant smoking everywhere, all the time..." He breathes in sharply. "But -- despite all this -- he is a great detective. One of the best I've seen, in fact."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know this sounds fantastic. But..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know this sounds fantastic. But I'm a four times decorated lieutenant of the RCM. I do not make up encounters with *cryptids* to spice up my day. I am very, very sane."

fields.Title: You: ""Boom. Boom. Boom.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Boom. Boom. Boom."

fields.Title: You: ""It's incredible. But it was real.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's incredible. But it was real."

"It's worrying. Especially considering his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a Mazovian socio-economist. He wants to liquidate the ruling class. Which -- again -- for a police officer... is a little odd."
fields.Alternate1: "It's worrying. Especially considering his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a Mazovian socio-economist. He's even gotten involved in a highly theoretical underground reading group. Which -- again -- for a police officer... is unusual."

fields.Title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: a helmet, a scope, and a passport."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("klaasje_passport")  and  (CheckItem("hat_t500") == true  or  CheckItem("deserter_scope") == true)

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yo, Cuno feels like you weren't re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yo, Cuno feels like you weren't really *listening* to Cuno." He drills his left temple with his index finger. "You were hearin' -- but you weren't listenin'. F***y f*g and the armour boys came to Martinaise to fuck shit up."

fields.Title: Authority: "Something that proves you haven't l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something that proves you haven't lost your mind.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What is this man -- eighty? Ninety..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is this man -- eighty? Ninety? What are we talking about here? A *octogenarian* sniper?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually -- you didn't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually -- you didn't."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Of course, lieutenant. Of course...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, lieutenant. Of course. We should treat the case and the phasmid as completely separate from each other. People are not going to..." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Incredible..." he repeats, turning..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Incredible..." he repeats, turning to Vicquemare. "The PR value of this is exceptional. 'Cop Discovers New Species.' Maybe even: 'Discovers the Insulindian Phasmid.' No... That's too much."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Absolutely -- this is great. This..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolutely -- this is great. This does not say 'vigilante murderers' to me at all. This says: science, news, human interest." He smiles. "You know, it's a really good thing you have that photo."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, I'm not going to waste more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, I'm not going to waste more time with this -- whatever it was, it wasn't entroponetical, or a giant bug. Cut the Paradox B shit, we're a police force."

fields.Title: Logic: "This is good. They can't deny it."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is good. They can't deny it.

fields.Title: You: ""It's my masterpiece. They'll teach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's my masterpiece. They'll teach this in cop-school."

fields.Title: You: ""Vrrr... Viva la Revolución!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Vrrr... Viva la Revolución!"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's so much better if he does this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's so much better if he does this. A million times better.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, it's better if *I* do t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective, it's better if *I* do that..." he says in a lowered voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did so at considerable risk to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He did so at considerable risk to his own life. He was shot -- not once, but twice. We stopped an execution, not a negotiation. The loss of life was minimal compared to what it could have been."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""On the case?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "On the case?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's just strange. Especially in l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's just strange. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a true blue moralist. A man of the centre. Not prone to political outbursts. Which is commendable. But also... at odds with his behaviour."

fields.Title: You: ""So what do you say? Wanna take thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So what do you say? Wanna take this hot shit back?" (Point to yourself.)

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He means murder weapon."
fields.Dialogue Text: He means murder weapon.

fields.Title: Drama: "Don't tell him about the phasmid. H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't tell him about the phasmid. He *will not* believe it. IT. DIDN'T. HAPPEN.

fields.Title: You: ""Just a hunch.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just a hunch."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Well -- then it wouldn't matter if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well -- then it wouldn't matter if it's male or female. The bower would just be rudimentary behaviour from before the parthenogenetic mutation."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It needs to be white coats and gla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It needs to be white coats and glassware for this fly. We need professionals..." He looks at the reeds.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, I reinvigorated the local ni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, I reinvigorated the local nightlife."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Trant Heidelstam: ""Of course. Excuse me. I just thoug..."]
Cuno: ""Fucking snitch binoclard..." He co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking snitch binoclard..." He collects himself. "Yeah -- that chick. Get over it pig, she didn't do it. It was grandpa on the island. Merc was fuckin' her and he couldn't hack it. Cuno can hack it."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "This left a mark. They can't deny i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This left a mark. They can't deny it, son -- you got the bastard.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "That's it. The verdict."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's it. The verdict.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Jean Vicquemare: ""Fine. Brilliant theory. A real mas..."]
Rhetoric: "Put the best proof forth. As solid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Put the best proof forth. As solid as you've got.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay. One question -- how do you k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. One question -- how do you know that?"

fields.Title: You: ""This was there." (Show him the hel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This was there." (Show him the helmet.)
fields.Alternate1: "This was there." (Point to your head.)

fields.Title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep it to yourself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective?" He turns to you."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective?" He turns to you.

"It's just strange. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a true blue moralist. A man of the centre. Not prone to political outbursts. Which is commendable. But also... at odds with his behaviour."
fields.Alternate1: "It's just strange. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a true blue moralist. He recently attempted to contact a Coalition warship in order to assign 'la responsabilité', which is commendable. But also... at odds with his own behaviour."

fields.Title: You: ""He may have committed *other* murd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He may have committed *other* murders over the years."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This sounds insane, Harry. What di..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This sounds insane, Harry. What did you *do* on that island?"

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Speak up, lieutenant," she tries t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Speak up, lieutenant," she tries to reassure you. "It's okay. I believe there was a straggler."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Female? What makes you think so?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Female? What makes you think so?"

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""As in cloning itself? What makes y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As in cloning itself? What makes you think so?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Get off the church-shit. It's maki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Get off the church-shit. It's making you sound crazy."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah! And I discovered a hitherto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah! And I discovered a hitherto unexplored entroponetical phenomenon in there too -- a two-millimetre hole in the world."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Why*? That's not what you were su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Why*? That's not what you were supposed to do here."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Jean -- it *is* his style.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jean -- it *is* his style."

fields.Title: You: ""He's a trained sniper. The weapon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used is more than capable of making the shot."
fields.Alternate1: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used -- the ballistics match."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Jealousy? He's what -- eighty? *Ni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jealousy? He's what -- eighty? *Ninety*? Didn't you say he's been in hiding since the Revolution?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm still not *completely* satisfi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm still not *completely* satisfied with it. It could be just a *little* neater."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's not how personal relationsh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not how personal relationships work, Harry. You found a straggler. The first since the Thirties. Kudos. But that doesn't *change* anything."

fields.Title: You: ""*This* is especially strange." (Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*This* is especially strange." (Show him the passport.)

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""With a corpse? That's it. No more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "With a corpse? That's it. No more phasmid-talk. There's no PR-value in delirium tremens."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Sounds like you got *played*, Harr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like you got *played*, Harry. Because you were off your tits on Al Gul."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Is that why you want us to investi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that why you want us to investigate the assassination of the previous Union head thing? To get off Evrart's hook?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Dammit. Not *that* jacket, the one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dammit. Not *that* jacket, the one you got for the Doom Spiral. Forget it... It's not worth the effort.

fields.Title: You: ""Cuno's a street kid I helped.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno's a street kid I helped."

fields.Title: Authority: "It's still a point for you. No deny..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's still a point for you. No denying it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He can talk human beings into tell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He can talk human beings into telling him anything. And he doesn't stop. In all the time I've spent with him, he has not once stopped working on the case. He is tireless. Madly driven."
fields.Alternate1: "He can talk human beings into telling him *everything*. And he doesn't stop. In all the time I've spent with him, he has not once stopped pursuing leads, however far-fetched and tangential. He is tireless. Madly driven."

fields.Title: You: ""It's probably not connected per se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's probably not connected per se -- but the perpetrator knew of its existence."

fields.Title: You: ""It may only be a small thing, but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It may only be a small thing, but I found a man's jacket!"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're right. It's *is* a small th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. It's *is* a small thing." He looks around. "Does anyone care? About a jacket? No one?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Smoked all those dinky fuckers. Sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Smoked all those dinky fuckers. Saved this shit -- Martinaise shit. I see he's mournin' and shit.... His main pig got semi-wasted. Sent to the boo-boo-mobile -- Cuno steps up. Cuno fucking FILLS those shoes. Big boy shoes -- Detective Cuno."

fields.Title: You: ""Cuno, if you're going to interrupt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno, if you're going to interrupt -- make it snappier."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""A straggler -- from the Revolution..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A straggler -- from the Revolution?" He sounds incredulous.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "His eyes are welling up now."
fields.Dialogue Text: His eyes are welling up now.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Why are you not fucking shitting y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are you not fucking shitting yourselves -- what's wrong?!" He glares at the officers standing silently in the falling snow. They look back at him, seemingly at a loss.

fields.Title: You: ""It's wild. But I have a confession..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's wild. But I have a confession *and* a murder weapon. He's on the island now -- waiting for arrest."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This sounds insane, Harry. What di..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This sounds insane, Harry. What did you *do* on that island? What happened to you?"

fields.Title: Authority: "It's not going well. You have to pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not going well. You have to present something sane and forceful. Make your case. You've done stuff. Good stuff.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This sounds hysterical, Harry. Wha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This sounds hysterical, Harry. What did you *do* on that island? What happened to you?"

fields.Title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: a helmet, a scope, and a passport."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("klaasje_passport")  and  (CheckItem("hat_t500") == true  or  CheckItem("deserter_scope") == true)

fields.Title: You: ""I think it emits a chemical that m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think it emits a chemical that makes it look even more like the reeds."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because I'm a police detective. An..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because I'm a police detective. And manufacturing drugs is *illegal*."

fields.Title: You: ""Uhm... Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm... Okay then."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing. It's not important.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. It's not important."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It's *definitely* your style to sol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's *definitely* your style to solve *side-shit*.

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""So... it *is* what a soldier of th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So... it *is* what a soldier of the ICM would be called."

fields.Title: You: ""No. I know what I saw. It was *rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I know what I saw. It was *real*."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes-yes. Fallen through a gap in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes-yes. Fallen through a gap in the boardwalk, drunk."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You fucking twisting his words aga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You fucking twisting his words again! My pig's wasn't *duped*. This pig's fucking *mastermind* shit. He doesn't do like that. He doesn't get fucked. Tell em --" He gestures for you to speak.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Win *who* back, you don't even know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Win *who* back, you don't even know her name!

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah," he agrees, giving you a qui..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah," he agrees, giving you a quick look. "Cuno's been around, seen shit, *real* shit -- he's not a fucking toddler!"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: "The man sighs. Deeply."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man sighs. Deeply.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""I must say, this," he points to th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I must say, this," he points to the photo, "is absolutely extraordinary. It's... I don't even have *words* for it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- but *also*...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- but *also*..."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""By god... is it somehow *connected..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By god... is it somehow *connected* to the case?"

fields.Title: You: ""I also looked into the mystery of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I also looked into the mystery of the Doomed Commercial Area."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah-yeah, straggler, sure." He no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah-yeah, straggler, sure." He nods to you, then turns back to Vicquemare. "You getting this *smart* shit? The old fuck killed him. Confessed to it too. We got him snitchin' on himself -- popo style."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Wacko-natural. I think I know what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wacko-natural. I think I know what it's gonna be...

fields.Title: Cuno: ""There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS on the island."

fields.Title: You: ""If Kim were here right now, he'd t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If Kim were here right now, he'd tell you it was inevitable."

fields.Title: You: ""I got shot too -- in that fight."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I got shot too -- in that fight." (Point to your leg.) "I did my absolute best."
fields.Alternate1: "I got shot too -- TWICE. I did my absolute best."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Bowers are built by males of specie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bowers are built by males of species who can't afford colourful mating displays physically -- this one *was* plain coloured...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing is off the table, but -- I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing is off the table, but -- I want to stress this -- the find does not have to be connected to the case. The case is 100% prosecutable -- without *any* kairomones."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I'm not that sure if I *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I'm not that sure if I *have* a motive. I had another thing..."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah. Politics shit. My pig also c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. Politics shit. My pig also connected, like... the weapon to him..." He looks to you.

fields.Title: Logic: "He's not getting it."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's not getting it.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay, Cuno -- okay." He rubs his t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, Cuno -- okay." He rubs his temples, then turns to you. "And he'll confess? To *prosecution* too?"

fields.Title: Authority: "There. No one is saying anything. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There. No one is saying anything. The silence agrees.

fields.Title: You: ""Listen -- he was acting violent. S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen -- he was acting violent. Scatterbrained. In a *fragile* mental state."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A strange psychosexual fixation. A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A strange psychosexual fixation. Aggravated -- possibly -- by proximity to the phasmid and its chemicals. He himself gave a political reason -- said he had killed an enemy combatant."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- until we stopped it." The l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- until we stopped it." The lieutenant is quick to correct him. "He saw the mercenary as an *enemy combatant* -- there's plenty for prosecution to pick from, as far as motive is concerned."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fucking gimp... it's more than *in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking gimp... it's more than *interesting*. Cuno's pig's laying down science here. Shit's legit."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What you're giving us is not news...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What you're giving us is not news. It's not proof, it's not even an observation. It's a cryptozoological factoid. You can get it from Paradox B, Aquarius, any *mystery* station..." He stops. "Here's *my* theory."

fields.Title: You: ""I *did* hallucinate a talking tie...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *did* hallucinate a talking tie..."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No shit.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No shit."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""I knew it! The bitch sees it. Bitc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I knew it! The bitch sees it. Bitches are fucking *smart*. But you dicks are dumb as fuck! It's real, I told you."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Maybe? Certainly. You're Evrart Cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe? Certainly. You're Evrart Claire's go-to-guy now. He's a *mob boss*, did you know?"
fields.Alternate1: "Maybe? Certainly. You're Evrart Claire's peone now. Just as I said. He's a *mob boss*, did you know?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't even know which jacket he'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't even know which jacket he's talking about. There have been... many things that he's found. He gets meticulous. But it's okay."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Who's *Cuno*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who's *Cuno*?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It's *interesting* time. Forget abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's *interesting* time. Forget about the rest.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay..." A slow nod."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay..." A slow nod.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's worrying. Especially consider..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's worrying. Especially considering his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a Mazovian socio-economist. He wants to liquidate the ruling class. Which -- again -- for a police officer... is a little odd."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Yes. Let's let the big boys talk."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. Let's let the big boys talk.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, except that one time when he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, except that one time when he stopped to sing karaoke. Which -- by the way -- was a valiant effort. He really sang his heart out."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes out the photo of the phasm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He takes out the photo of the phasmid and shows it to the officers across the yard. The wind blows, flapping the glossy rectangle in his hand.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fucking hell, is that... Is this s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking hell, is that... Is this somehow *connected* to the case?" He ignores you, still staring at the phasmid.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- but *also*...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- but *also*..."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes. It really does make it hard t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. It really does make it hard to fire the drunk..." His tired eyes follow the photo as the lieutenant puts it away.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There! You need to make your case -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There! You need to make your case -- now. The floor is all yours, he prepared it well.

fields.Title: You: ""Khm... I *also* started a night cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khm... I *also* started a night club. In the church."
fields.Alternate1: "Khm... I *also* started a night club -- and a drug lab -- in the church."

fields.Title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: a helmet and a scope."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("klaasje_passport") == false  and  (CheckItem("hat_t500") == true  or  CheckItem("deserter_scope") == true)

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Don't think it's a good idea to let..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't think it's a good idea to let him speak.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- smoked a ton of people --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- smoked a ton of people -- unsolved shit." He nods and crosses his arms regally. "Now listen up, suit-fuck. You're gonna shit yourself, because it's gonna get wacko-natural."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""WHAT?! I can't fucking *believe* t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "WHAT?! I can't fucking *believe* this shit... He's lying!" He turns back to them. "He's fucking lying. We were *just* there, he went up to it. He fucking touched it!"
fields.Alternate1: "WHAT?! I can't fucking *believe* this shit... He's lying!" He turns back to them. "He's fucking lying. We were *just* there, he went up to it. He touched it! He fucking *talked* to it!"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You went in drunk and got people k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You went in drunk and got people killed." He shakes his head. "Why are you even *here* -- after Kitsuragi got shot? What else could you possibly fuck up?"

fields.Title: You: ""I solved the case. A straggler fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I solved the case. A straggler from the Revolution shot the merc. He was hiding for *fifty* years on that island before I found him."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You just left him on the island --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You just left him on the island -- unguarded?"

fields.Title: Logic: "There is a *perfect* explanation fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a *perfect* explanation for that!

fields.Title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: a helmet and a scope."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("klaasje_passport") == false  and  (CheckItem("hat_t500") == true  or  CheckItem("deserter_scope") == true)

fields.Title: You: ""To me it seemed to have... *some*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To me it seemed to have... *some* character."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I told them a police raid will swe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I told them a police raid will sweep the church in two days. Which, by the way -- it will. If they have any brains they won't be producing in there."

fields.Title: You: ""Why?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What?" He cups his ear -- the wind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?" He cups his ear -- the wind blows. "It sounded like you set up a drug lab!"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It's not *that* okay. Get off this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not *that* okay. Get off this subject. Now.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""This man would be Lilian's son --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This man would be Lilian's son -- Lilianovich." He turns to Vicquemare. "The custom was overturned after the revolutions failed, but not before making it to Revachol."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Thank you, Trant. Thank you for th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, Trant. Thank you for that piece of cultural theory." He turns to you. "You said you have a *motive*."

fields.Title: You: ""He also had political reasons.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He also had political reasons."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah. Check this shit -- he's like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. Check this shit -- he's like some fucking old school warrior. Man From Hjelmdall shit. Only against rich people and... pederasts I think? Cuno doesn't know what a pederast is, Cuno's not a university..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Also -- we have ballistics from th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Also -- we have ballistics from the gun, matching the bullet found in the dead mercenary's head. *And* two officers on the scene that Mr. Dros *confessed* to."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Cryptozoology? You're giving me *c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cryptozoology? You're giving me *cryptozoology*? Trant was feeling *pity* for you -- you use the chance to go *full crypto*!"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Get over yourself -- you're not a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Get over yourself -- you're not a *perfectionist*. You're a cop and you did a good job. With a lot of help from Lieutenant Kitsuragi."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You experienced a *delirium halluc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You experienced a *delirium hallucination*. It's typical of cognitive damage. From years of chronic alcoholism. You started *seeing shit* in the reeds -- and convinced this poor kid of it too."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's a helmet. From the victim. No..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a helmet. From the victim. Nothing about this even *remotely* proves the existence of a giant insect. Here's my theory, Harry."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""The tie's talking again -- that's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The tie's talking again -- that's it. No more phasmid-talk. There's no PR-value in delirium tremens."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fucking... Cuno doesn't have a pho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking... Cuno doesn't have a photo camera 'cause Cuno *is* fucking POOR, okay?! That sucks about the Cuno. So Cuno didn't take a fucking PHOTO. And Cuno didn't paint a fucking picture."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Fuck it -- I believe him." She loo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck it -- I believe him." She looks at Vicquemare and shrugs.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""If that's even remotely true, then..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If that's even remotely true, then a clandestine investigation will be required. It smells like *bad news* to me -- a classic shitkid case that'll get people killed. Or fired."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Not discussing it further *out here..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not discussing it further *out here in the open* is probably a good idea. People must have seen you return from the island. Word travels fast...

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Still," she says quietly. "Good wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Still," she says quietly. "Good work with the missing person, detective."

fields.Title: You: ""This is what I've been trying to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is what I've been trying to tell you about."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "That's it. The cavalry has arrived."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's it. The cavalry has arrived.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "But a case against Evrart would be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But a case against Evrart would be big...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did so at considerable risk to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He did so at considerable risk to his own life. He was shot, and survived only because of his armour. We stopped an execution, not a negotiation. The loss of life was minimal compared to what it could have been."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*One* week.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*One* week."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't doubt you, lieutenant. If..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't doubt you, lieutenant. If you say it was the Insulindian phasmid then it was the Insulindian Phasmid."

fields.Title: Empathy: "This is a very, very sad man who ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is a very, very sad man who has just seen something that's made him forget his sadness.

fields.Title: You: ""You have to believe me. There *was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You have to believe me. There *was* a giant phasmid on the island."
fields.Alternate1: "I lied. There *was* a phasmid. It's real. You have to believe me."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You don't *know* what happened her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't *know* what happened here. You don't know this shit. Automatic fucking weapons. Urban battleground shit. Battle lines drawn in *blood*. Blood Meridian. You don't *know* this shit."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Now -- Cuno wasn't there. Right --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now -- Cuno wasn't there. Right -- you getting this? Cuno was breaking it up with Cuno's main bitch C. Parting-of-the-ways shit. But when Cuno got there -- pig had fucking *cleaned up*. Blood and ruin."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, fucko. He's on the island ri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, fucko. He's on the island right now. In a coma or some shit. Oh -- and we also got the gun. Gun-of-the-killer shit. You know what I mean. *Now* let's get our big boy shit on..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You had to see it... It had the su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You had to see it... It had the subdued colours of a female. And the nesting behaviour too, I think."

fields.Title: You: ""It told me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It told me."

fields.Title: You: ""The perpetrator seemed intoxicated..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The perpetrator seemed intoxicated somehow. Like an addict. It's just a hunch, but..."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah! I did some kids a solid. Tur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah! I did some kids a solid. Turned their lives around."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah! And I discovered a hitherto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah! And I discovered a hitherto unexplored entroponetical phenomenon in there too -- a two-millimetre hole in the world."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't care what your drug lab is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't care what your drug lab is called..." He calms himself. "Fuck it. You're done as a cop -- become a polonium dealer for all I care."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Paradox B is a fringe science magaz..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Paradox B is a fringe science magazine published in Graad. Its mission is to explain theories like telekinesis and intraisolary pale, before they get out of hand.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No, it didn't -- it didn't turn ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it didn't -- it didn't turn out to be entroponetical *again*. Enough with the isolary-pale two-millimetre-hole-in-the-world line. This isn't Paradox B. We're a police force."

fields.Title: Logic: "He thinks this detail bolsters your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He thinks this detail bolsters your straggler theory.

fields.Title: Authority: "Bring him to heel."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bring him to heel.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Klaasje -- as in the suspect he le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Klaasje -- as in the suspect he let escape? From Kitsuragi's report?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You were *just* up his asscrack fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were *just* up his asscrack for the mass murder shit. Now it's nothing? Why do you think that shit *happened?*"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Phasmid... Jude, I think we should..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Phasmid... Jude, I think we should just go and write Harry a station call. It's getting..."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, okay, I get it -- people dev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, okay, I get it -- people develop fucked up psyches in solitude. If he's been hiding for fifty *years* it's understandable."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""It's a clean win.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a clean win."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I'm pulling the plug on this *stra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm pulling the plug on this *straggler* thing." He shakes his head. "You're gonna get a station call to explain what happened. Coast guard is gonna scan the island. That's it."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, and it had like these... tuf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, and it had like these... tufts of reeds on it. Even after it unfolded. And bitch -- it unfolded like crazy! It was fucking beautiful."

fields.Title: You: ""Intuition. Turns out I have a wide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Intuition. Turns out I have a wide intellectual base in here." (Point to your head.)

fields.Title: Half Light: "Maybe it's true?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe it's true?

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Shit was there -- display the shit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shit was there -- display the shit, pig. The shit! It's the proof."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Cuno -- please. If it's on the isl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno -- please. If it's on the island, then it will be seen again. Calm down..."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fuck you. You just got played by E..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck you. You just got played by Evrart Claire. Duped -- for the hundredth time."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not *quite* like that... The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not *quite* like that... The move allowed us to stabilize things here. It was *not* bad for Martinaise. And we don't owe anyone anything."

fields.Title: You: ""It's *way* more than that. I'll wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's *way* more than that. I'll win her back with this."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He appreciated you remembering."
fields.Dialogue Text: He appreciated you remembering.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't make this *harder* for yours..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't make this *harder* for yourself," he says in a lowered voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well..." He pulls up his collar. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well..." He pulls up his collar. "The drinking, the gun-losing, also losing the badge -- that's all true. Although he has *not* been drinking on the job this week."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As you can see -- it's about three..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As you can see -- it's about three metres tall. In fact, we think it may be the largest land invertebrate ever discovered."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well... except that one time when..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well... except that one time when he stopped to sing karaoke. Which, by the way -- I have to disagree with you, Mr. Vicquemare -- was a valiant effort. He really sang his heart out."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes out the photo and shows it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He takes out the photo and shows it to the officers across the yard. Rain comes down, he covers the glossy photo of the phasmid with his hand.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The old man was not *aware* of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The old man was not *aware* of the phasmid's presence. Exhibiting a strange, atypical dementia, he fell into a stupor after its appearance. He became near-catatonic."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: ""So -- as you can see, I'm a *prett..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective."
fields.Alternate1: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective -- and an absolutely GIANT FASCIST."
fields.Alternate2: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective -- and an absolutely GIANT COMMUNIST."
fields.Alternate3: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective -- and an absolutely visionary entrepeneur."

fields.Title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: behold, a passport."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("hat_t500") == false  and  CheckItem("deserter_scope") == false  and  CheckItem("klaasje_passport") == true

fields.Title: Half Light: "Oh no.... *all* in."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh no.... *all* in.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Not bad, Cuno. Could be a little *s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not bad, Cuno. Could be a little *shorter* though.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Don't make this about Lieutenant K..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't make this about Lieutenant Kitsuragi. He's a *great* cop -- and you almost got him killed. I don't even understand why you're *here* after he got shot."

fields.Title: You: ""Ha ha ha..." (Laugh nervously.) "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha ha ha..." (Laugh nervously.) "I don't know why I won't stop talking about the *three-metres-tall stick insect*. There was no insect!"

fields.Title: You: ""I talked to it. It told me about t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I talked to it. It told me about the pale and the Oxygen Holocaust, and how its antenna turned into a foot."

fields.Title: Drama: "He's really softening it up there."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's really softening it up there.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's great! *Night club owner* i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's great! *Night club owner* is a great new career -- because you're *done* as a police officer."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Get a grip. No one cares about you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Get a grip. No one cares about your *entroponetic adventures* right now."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't have time for this. Straig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't have time for this. Straight to the motive, please."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""A detective *and* a civilian. Jean..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A detective *and* a civilian. Jean -- *and* the gun. He has it..."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, he was like a fuckin' assass..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, he was like a fuckin' assassin, tell him..."

fields.Title: You: ""I did all I could. Every second wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did all I could. Every second was a struggle."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No -- I don't *have* to believe yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No -- I don't *have* to believe you made a *zoological discovery*. That is not a must. And even if you did... you're a cop. Who cares?"

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""That's not *proof*, it's a descrip..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not *proof*, it's a description. But -- befitting a stick insect. If it's camouflaged to look like the reeds then it would have to be pretty large."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Bugs everywhere. *Plants* turning..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Bugs everywhere. *Plants* turning into bugs. It's a typical hallucination. Every drunk past the age of forty has seen it."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You think? Claire played you like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think? Claire played you like a fiddle. You got duped -- for the hundredth time."
fields.Alternate1: "You think? Claire played you like a fiddle. It's true, you *are* his little peone."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. It's *nothing* like that. He w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. It's *nothing* like that. He was reckless with information -- but ethical. We don't owe anyone anything. This allowed us to stabilize things in Martinaise."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're right, lieutenant -- I don'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, lieutenant -- I don't." He turns to you. "You snorted the drugs, I know you did. It's all right, I mean, at this point -- *anything* is but the drink."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't care. You took some drugs..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't care. You took some drugs from some kid. And then snorted them. It's all right -- honestly. *Anything* but the drink."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're not the only cop in the wor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not the only cop in the world, Harry. This all comes back to us."

fields.Title: You: ""Observation.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Observation."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then there's the... self-flagellat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then there's the... self-flagellation issue. He likes to apologize -- profusely. Making it sound like he's guilty of at least first degree murder. It's not a good communication strategy for an officer. It's..."

fields.Title: You: ""Boom shakalaka.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Boom shakalaka."

"It's worrying. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a fascist. A far-right woman-hater and, of course, also into race-stuff. Which -- for a police officer --" He shakes his head. "Not good."
fields.Alternate1: "It's worrying. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a fascist. He's spent *hours* trying to find a way to 'reverse time' with other far-right individuals. And, of course, there's the race-stuff. Which -- for a police officer --" He shakes his head. "Not good."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, by gun of the killer, Cuno m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, by gun of the killer, Cuno means the murder weapon. We have it."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You aren't fucking *listening*! Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You aren't fucking *listening*! The bum is nothing. This is science history here. It was the Insulindian phasmid. It's *connected* to this shit." He turns to you. "Tell him!"

fields.Title: You: ""There was no Insulindian phasmid.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was no Insulindian phasmid."

fields.Title: You: ""The company hired unvetted mercena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The company hired unvetted mercenaries. It was their fault. I did all I could."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""A straggler? From the *Revolution?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A straggler? From the *Revolution?*" He sounds incredulous.

fields.Title: You: ""It's no joke. I found the Insulind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's no joke. I found the Insulindian phasmid. I discovered a new species."
fields.Alternate1: "It's no joke. I found the biggest land invertebrate ever found. I discovered a new species."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's genuinely concerned now."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's genuinely concerned now.

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Lieutenant, please. The straggler..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant, please. The straggler -- just... stick to that. You said you *solved* the case?"

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Hmm, yes. That would be a kairomon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, yes. That would be a kairomone -- a pheromone that's seemingly beneficial to the host. It usually stimulates the affected nervous system -- not a human's, of course, but perhaps a predator's?"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Wait -- he tried to set up a drug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- he tried to set up a drug lab?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. He just let some youths set up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. He just let some youths set up a club in the church. They *thought* they could produce in there. They won't. The building was abandoned. It was an okay idea -- better than having them out on the ice."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah! I reinvigorated the local ni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah! I reinvigorated the local nightlife."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Hmm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hmm...

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's great! *Entroponaut* is a g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's great! *Entroponaut* is a great new career for you -- *after* police officer. I don't care. Go live in the fucking pale."

fields.Title: You: ""Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 10. A comme..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 10. A commercial building where all businesses go bankrupt. I looked into it."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay, Trant, thank you. I get it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, Trant, thank you. I get it. Harry..." He looks at you sternly. "No more giant insects -- you said you have a *motive*."

fields.Title: You: ""He killed the mercenary in an act..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He killed the mercenary in an act of jealousy."

fields.Title: Logic: "He wasn't quite sure about the stra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He wasn't quite sure about the straggler before he heard this detail. It must have convinced him.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He understands you *have* to nail t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He understands you *have* to nail this.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay. Mastermind.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Mastermind."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, like... the ballistics too,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, like... the ballistics too, pig. We got him *knee deep* in popo shit."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fine. Brilliant theory. A real mas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine. Brilliant theory. A real masterpiece. You'll get a station call and you can tell all about it -- to some *other* officer. We'll send the coast guard to the island. Maybe they'll find your giant insect too."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And how do you know that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And how do you know that?"

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""You're right about that...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right about that..."

fields.Title: You: ""Edgar Claire.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Edgar Claire."

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe..."

fields.Title: You: ""Hey -- how do you know about Al Gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey -- how do you know about Al Gul?"

fields.Title: Volition: "Chin up. Keep focusing on the posit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Chin up. Keep focusing on the positives here.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I've never doubted you can pull yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've never doubted you can pull yourself together and work -- in bouts. Bouts don't last." He buttons his jacket. "I can still smell the booze on the wind."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You think?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Dodged the bullet there. For a mome..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dodged the bullet there. For a moment it seemed like you were just wasting time.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He apprehended a revolutionary bri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He apprehended a revolutionary brigade who stayed hidden for fifty years, ever since the Revolution; who's probably committed other murders over those years..." He pauses. "Oh -- and he also discovered a new species."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes out the photo and shows it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He takes out the photo and shows it to the officers across the yard. Thick white snow falls all around you -- flakes stick to the glossy photo of the phasmid.

fields.Title: You: ""Boom shakalaka, motherfucker!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Boom shakalaka, motherfucker!"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Lieutenant -- is it somehow *conne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant -- is it somehow *connected* to the case?" He pays you no heed.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""We could order a search. I could g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We could order a search. I could get people from EPIS on the island, entomologists, doctors. There must be signs of it in the reeds -- if we found the Insulindian phasmid, well -- that would be absolutely *exceptional*. The PR value alone..."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You may want to rethink your strate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You may want to rethink your strategy of letting a 12 year old present your case.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""This case -- this fucking grandpa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This case -- this fucking grandpa shit.... this ugly shit? It's *nothing*. We saw a ghost. A real life ghost. Like he fucking proved *ghosts* are real -- it's that big, popo. It's fucking..."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Lieutenant, please -- you have to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant, please -- you have to have more than just some *mantis*. The straggler -- stick to that. You said you solved the murder."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What is this, a joke? We *will* du..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is this, a joke? We *will* dump you, Harry. We will leave you here -- you'll be just another bum on the coast. This is a *trial*. Stop fucking around."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""They're not going to go for this s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're not going to go for this speculation in the Constabulatory."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah. *And* a night club. In the c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. *And* a night club. In the church. It was a huge operation to set it up."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You turned a church into a night c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You turned a church into a night club -- the *kids* are probably shooting up in there... What else did you do? Desecrate the altar? Shit in the chancel?"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's not what you were *sent* to d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not what you were *sent* to do here."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Jean -- it's his style. He does si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jean -- it's his style. He does side cases. I'm sure it was important enough. Call it community outreach."

fields.Title: You: ""He killed the mercenary hoping to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He killed the mercenary hoping to start a war between the company and the Union."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Jean. He has it. No more cooperati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jean. He has it. No more cooperation needed. He had a civilian there for the confession -- this is doable."

fields.Title: Volition: "It will pass -- in time."
fields.Dialogue Text: It will pass -- in time.

fields.Title: Cuno: "He comes to a sudden, abrupt stop."
fields.Dialogue Text: He comes to a sudden, abrupt stop.
