fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay. We'll see about it when we g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. We'll see about it when we get coast guard on the island."

fields.Title: You: ""I know things about it. I think it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know things about it. I think it reproduces by parthenogenesis."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Large?!" The kid slaps his forehea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Large?!" The kid slaps his forehead in disbelief. "Gimp, it was fucking *gigantic*!"

fields.Title: You: ""It had taken this -- from the kill..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It had taken this -- from the killer." (Show him the scope.)

fields.Title: You: ""I *did* have a conversation with a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *did* have a conversation with a corpse..."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "And eyes too -- your return from th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And eyes too -- your return from the island must not have gone unnoticed.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. I wouldn't say it was..." He l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I wouldn't say it was..." He looks to you.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""I would prefer *not* to partake in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would prefer *not* to partake in anything Union-related." The consultant, too, has lowered his voice. "For political neutrality."

fields.Title: Logic: "This has to be good stuff for him t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This has to be good stuff for him to backpedal out of it at first mention.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Damn, now it sounds like you were j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Damn, now it sounds like you were just wasting time.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You've spent the week with him --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've spent the week with him -- on this case. What is your take?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Here comes the cavalry."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here comes the cavalry.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And he *solved* it. Near-perfectly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And he *solved* it. Near-perfectly. In one week we have: a confession, a murder weapon -- *and* the perpetrator. Locked on the island right now, awaiting transportation."

fields.Title: You: ""I think it reproduces by parthenog..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think it reproduces by parthenogenesis."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Are you done?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you done?"

fields.Title: You: ""He may have committed other murder..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He may have committed other murders over the years -- we have him confessing to one too. A big one."

fields.Title: Authority: "His patience has all but run out. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His patience has all but run out. The boy better wrap it up...

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yo -- this is like the biggest mom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yo -- this is like the biggest moment in history right now. You wanna fucking listen to what's coming out of Cuno's *mouth*." He points to his crooked scowl.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""We saw a giant insect. White as fu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We saw a giant insect. White as fuck. *Literally* the Insulindian phasmid or some shit. Praying mantis-style. It was three metres tall, and this pig right here..." He points his finger at you.

fields.Title: You: ""There was an Insulindian phasmid...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was an Insulindian phasmid. But it's not connected to the case."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know. What I *do* know is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. What I *do* know is -- there was no giant stick insect on the island. That would be insane."

fields.Title: Logic: "She's right. This is not going well..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's right. This is not going well for you. You have to present something coherent -- and sane.

fields.Title: You: ""Its nervous system may be stored i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Its nervous system may be stored in its long limbs."

fields.Title: You: "(Conclude.) "It had mandibles that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Conclude.) "It had mandibles that looked like hair. And it was completely white on the inside."

fields.Title: You: ""It was a sensing entity. There was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was a sensing entity. There was something there."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It wasn't the fucking wind! You sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It wasn't the fucking wind! You said you started a drug lab." He takes a moment to collect himself. "Fine. I don't care. You're done as a cop -- become a polonium dealer for all I care."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: "He shrugs. "I don't know what a 'Do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He shrugs. "I don't know what a 'Doomed Commercial Area' is."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""This pig *helps* people, okay? He'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This pig *helps* people, okay? He's a fuckin' handy helper, he does that shit. He finds insects and solves side-shit. It's his style. Side-style."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's not what he was sent here to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not what he was sent here to do. He was sent here to solve a murder -- not look into commercial areas."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No, it didn't -- it didn't turn ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it didn't -- it didn't turn out to be entroponetical *again*. Enough with two millimetre holes and the giant bugs -- this isn't Paradox B. We're a police force."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""It *is* what a soldier of the ICM..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It *is* what a soldier of the ICM would be called."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Slam the weapon man, the murder wea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Slam the weapon man, the murder weapon.

fields.Title: You: ""I think once he's resuscitated --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think once he's resuscitated -- yes. We got him talking once. He'll talk again."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "A strange psychosexual fa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods. "A strange psychosexual fascination. The result of spending all this time in solitude, on the islands of this bay... And trauma too. He himself gave a political reason. In his mind, he had killed an enemy combatant."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Jude, he's drunk. It's cold. I'm f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jude, he's drunk. It's cold. I'm fucking freezing. Let's get him to the station when he's sobered up. In two weeks or something."

fields.Title: You: ""I approached it and had a conversa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I approached it and had a conversation with it. We talked."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Understood. Of course.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood. Of course."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""The fuck, you puss? This'll send s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fuck, you puss? This'll send shit flying. Trust Cuno. Grandpa laid down some real shit. *Conspiracy*-style."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""How? It seems to be ongoing. I see..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How? It seems to be ongoing. I see red banners on the gates."

fields.Title: You: ""I did it for the World Revolution.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did it for the World Revolution."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You fucking twisting his words aga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You fucking twisting his words again! My pig's not *dirty*. This is fucking *paladin* shit. He don't bend like that. Tell em --" He gestures for you to speak.

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Jean, stop brutalizing him... He's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jean, stop brutalizing him... He's trying."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You don't want to know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't want to know."

fields.Title: You: ""Cuno's great. I should have taken..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno's great. I should have taken him to the island. He'd tell you it's all true."

fields.Title: You: ""To hell with it. You wouldn't unde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To hell with it. You wouldn't understand anyway."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah... it was what it was...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah... it was what it was..."

fields.Title: You: ""So -- as you can see, I'm a *prett..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective."
fields.Alternate1: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective -- an absolutely GIANT FASCIST."
fields.Alternate2: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective -- an abolutely GIANT COMMUNIST."
fields.Alternate3: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective -- an absolutely visionary entrepreneur."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "That's it. The argument is lost."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's it. The argument is lost.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Go? And *hand* the terminal over t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go? And *hand* the terminal over to the Claire brothers?"

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Mhm..." He ignores your answer. "T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm..." He ignores your answer. "Then it wouldn't matter if it's male or female. The bower would just be rudimentary behaviour from before the parthenogenetic mutation."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Interesting..." He ignores your an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Interesting..." He ignores your answers. "Then it is *especially* vulnerable to disease. A single strain of bacteria could wipe out the entire species. We're probably talking conservation efforts here..." He looks around, quickly assessing the coast.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Now you make your case. Now is the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now you make your case. Now is the time. Now or never.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also a full b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Odder still -- he is also a full blown fascist. An ultranationalist woman-hater and more than a little racist. How he reconciles these two points of view..." He shrugs. "But he is *vocal* about both."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also a full b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Odder still -- he is also a full blown fascist. An ultranationalist woman-hater and more than a little racist. Which, I guess, goes well with the *grind*? I do not know -- but he is *vocal* about both beliefs."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The killer did not seem to be *awa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The killer did not seem to be *aware* of the phasmid's presence. Exhibiting a strange, atypical dementia, he fell into a stupor after its appearance. He became near-catatonic."

fields.Title: You: ""Khm... yes. I believe the pheromon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khm... yes. I believe the pheromone it emits may be responsible for the killer's mental degradation."

fields.Title: You: ""Boom. Boom. Boom.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Boom. Boom. Boom."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes. I understand. He was in the f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I understand. He was in the fight."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Second -- you dinky fucking asshol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Second -- you dinky fucking asshole. This pig right here," he points to you, "this oink-oink motherfucker *solved* that shit. On Death Island. Case solved. Go home, or fuck off."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Too late -- we're *in* this. There..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Too late -- we're *in* this. There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS on the island."

fields.Title: You: ""There was an Insulindian phasmid...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was an Insulindian phasmid. *And* it may be connected to the case."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Ouch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ouch...

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fuck it. Fine. I don't care. Your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck it. Fine. I don't care. Your life as a cop is over -- become a polonium dealer for all I care."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's great! *Entroponaut* is a g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's great! *Entroponaut* is a great new career for you -- *after* police officer. I don't care. Go live in the pale."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""This narrow-minded pig," he mumble..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This narrow-minded pig," he mumbles, drilling his temples with his index fingers. "I can't fucking..."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fucking... listen to him, pig! Gra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking... listen to him, pig! Grandpa's *deranged*. Cuno knows you don't believe this phasmid shit -- but he was hatin' rich people, some kind of *pederasts* too... fuckin' hating *everything*."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Snitch binoclard..." He collects h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Snitch binoclard..." He collects himself. "Yeah. Klaasje -- that chick. But she didn't do it. It was this old fuck. Grandpa on the island. Merc was fucking her and he couldn't hack it. Cuno can hack it."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Jean, maybe..." She stops and sigh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jean, maybe..." She stops and sighs.

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Well, that's not exactly *proof*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, that's not exactly *proof*. It's a theory. But -- it *is* interesting."

fields.Title: You: ""The damage alcohol has done to my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The damage alcohol has done to my mind *is* extensive..."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You bet it was. Sounds to me like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You bet it was. Sounds to me like you got *played* -- because you were off your tits on Al Gul."
fields.Alternate1: "You bet it was. Sounds to me like you got *played* by Claire. And it's true -- you *are* his little peone."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- he really fucked the Cuno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- he really fucked the Cuno on that," the kid says with a respectful glance. "But that's old shit. Cuno's now. Pig's just being a good pig. That's cool to Cuno."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What you're giving us -- it's not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What you're giving us -- it's not news. It's not proof. Or an observation. It's a cryptozoological factoid. You can get it from Paradox B, Aquarius, any *mystery* station. Here's *my* theory."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah! And he's not ten, he's fucki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah! And he's not ten, he's fucking twelve!"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Thank you for the input, Lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for the input, Lieutenant Kitsuragi. I didn't mean to suggest you didn't handle the situation..." He brushes a stray strand of hair out of his eye and coughs.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""On Lieutenant-Yefreitor Du Bois.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "On Lieutenant-Yefreitor Du Bois."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""See?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "See?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I had a major collision with him o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I had a major collision with him on the subject. He yielded, and is now striving to be a crypto-fascist. That is: a regular police officer who *thinks* these things but doesn't say them. So that's... yeah."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A colossal stick insect -- three m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A colossal stick insect -- three metres tall. It's on the island, camouflaged as the reeds. It... unfolded from them. I did not -- unfortunately -- get a photo. But I believe it may have been the Insulindian phasmid."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fucking hell is that..." The man c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking hell is that..." The man cranes his neck, still looking at the photo. "Is this somehow... *connected* to the case?"

fields.Title: You: ""*And* I also fixed the strike situ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*And* I also fixed the strike situation."

fields.Title: You: ""He, uh... being a Communard probab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He, uh... being a Communard probably had to do with it. You know, class warfare stuff."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""First of all, yo -- those guys wer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First of all, yo -- those guys were all f****ts. The guys in the armour? F****ts. The Union guys? F****ts. So yeah --" He stares Vicquemare in the eye. "Suck Cuno's dick. You don't *know* me."

fields.Title: You: ""Look -- point is, we solved the ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look -- point is, we solved the case."

fields.Title: You: ""Look -- point is, we saved as many..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look -- point is, we saved as many people as we could."

fields.Title: You: ""It was a straggler -- from the Rev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was a straggler -- from the Revolution. Who's stayed in hiding for 50 years. I found him."

fields.Title: Volition: "No. There was a giant insect and th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. There was a giant insect and they *have* to understand that. You will find proof. Don't give up.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "It was definitely female."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was definitely female.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, but also reed-coloured -- bei..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, but also reed-coloured -- beige and brown, a little green -- on the outside. After unfolding from a single stalk, it still retained parts that looked like reed tufts on its limbs."

fields.Title: You: ""It could have been male, actually...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It could have been male, actually..."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Very interesting." He looks around..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very interesting." He looks around, quickly assessing the coast. "Such organisms are extremely vulnerable to disease. A single strain of bacteria could wipe out the whole species. We're probably looking at conservation efforts here..."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""It must be robust if it can move a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It must be robust if it can move a helmet with its limbs..." He trails off, lost in thought.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah! I did some kids a solid. Tur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah! I did some kids a solid. Turned their lives around."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What were you even doing in some c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What were you even doing in some commercial area? Your *job* was to solve a murder, not *Martinaise*."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Lilianovich?" The special consulta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lilianovich?" The special consultant raises an eyebrow. "A Revolutionary matronym..."

fields.Title: You: ""A Revolutionary matronym?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A Revolutionary matronym?"

fields.Title: You: ""He killed him in an act of rage in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He killed him in an act of rage induced by the phasmid's semiochemicals."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Resuscitated* -- that sounds grea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Resuscitated* -- that sounds great..."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You ain't saying shit, because you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You ain't saying shit, because you don't got shit to say."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Worse than Cuno's violent dad. Sha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Worse than Cuno's violent dad. Shakes like a pig, eyes like saucers. Wavin' at nothing. That's some dark shit -- and he's been with that bug for like -- ever. Don't close your mind to this shit!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Also -- we have a sniper's nest wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Also -- we have a sniper's nest with full view of the room in which the mercenary died. Right on the island. *And* two officers on the scene that Mr. Dros *confessed* to."

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "God dammit -- it *is* bad. Even you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: God dammit -- it *is* bad. Even you can smell it.

fields.Title: Drama: "You did not -- under any circumstan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You did not -- under any circumstances -- *talk* to it.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You experienced a *delirium halluc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You experienced a *delirium hallucination*. It's typical of cognitive damage. From chronic alcoholism. Which is what you have. So you started *seeing shit* in the reeds."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's a passport. Waterlogged paper..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a passport. Waterlogged paper. Nothing about this even *remotely* proves the existence of a giant insect. Here's my theory, Harry."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah. But for, like, conservative..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. But for, like, conservative Revolution."

fields.Title: You: ""How did you know I found him?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you know I found him?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You're doing good here. Perhaps onl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're doing good here. Perhaps only for a moment, but still...

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah... maybe I didn't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah... maybe I didn't."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did so at considerable risk to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He did so at considerable risk to his person. Remember -- he was shot. We stopped an execution, not a negotiation. The loss of life was minimal compared to what it could have been."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then there's the apocalypse thing...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then there's the apocalypse thing. At first I thought it was a joke -- but it's not. He actually thinks the world is about to end. In a *bloodletting*, or a *gloaming*. We're about to *become vapour*, even..."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You should yell something."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should yell something.

fields.Title: You: ""I AM A POLICEMAN OF THE STATE TO C..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I AM A POLICEMAN OF THE STATE TO COME!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then there's the *boring cop* issu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then there's the *boring cop* issue. Despite all the obvious and almost grotesque mannerisms and sartorial choices he still insists he isn't *characteristic* enough. It's..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also an ultra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Odder still -- he is also an ultraliberal 'hustler' who is always..." The lieutenant pinches the root of his nose. "*On the grind.* Which I guess, goes well with some of his racism. I don't know -- he is vocal about both beliefs though."

"It's odd. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a 'hustler'. He..." The lieutenant pinches the root of his nose. "Grinds. He makes *the reál*. He's a 'visionary' and a 'money engineer', which is just..." He shakes his head.
fields.Alternate1: "It's odd. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a 'hustler'. He..." the lieutenant pinches the root of his nose, "recently commissioned a monument to his own 'grind' in the middle of the roundabout, which is just..." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Hardie *boys* or whatever the fuck..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hardie *boys* or whatever the fuck they are -- they were tellin' everyone and their mom how they wasted one of those armour fucks. It was *always* gonna go down like that. My pig stepped up -- got fucked in the leg for it. Sacrifice style."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- and solved that shit. Fuck..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- and solved that shit. Fucking... grandpa in the woods did it. Old shit. Cuno doesn't know about that. Look -- the REAL SHIT here is..."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""This fucking *old* popo *discovere..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This fucking *old* popo *discovered* it. Me and the pig-bacon discovered a new *species*. It was beautiful. It was..." He pauses, out of breath, then continues: "You ain't seen this kind of animal before. Fucking *miracle* shit."

fields.Title: Volition: "No. There was a giant insect and th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. There was a giant insect and they *have* to understand that. You will find proof. Don't give up.

fields.Title: Authority: "It's not going well. You have to pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not going well. You have to present something now. Something sane and forceful. Make your case.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah -- from the Revolution. He ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- from the Revolution. He may have killed others too."
fields.Alternate1: "Yeah -- from the Revolution. He has killed others too -- the previous Union leader, for one."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Like a cephalopod's? Phasmids, I t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like a cephalopod's? Phasmids, I think, only have nerves in their heads and abdomens, though... there is a correlation between invertebrate size and intelligence. Was it...?"

fields.Title: You: ""I still think it was female.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still think it was female."

fields.Title: You: ""Intelligent? It behaved like an in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Intelligent? It behaved like an insect."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You know -- it might have been a *b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know -- it might have been a *bad* idea to tell him that. Unless you want to be a drug baron and not a cop, of course...

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""This man's mother was Lilian. He's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This man's mother was Lilian. He's Lilian's son -- Lilianovich. The custom was overturned after the Revolution failed, but not before it made it to Revachol."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay." He rubs his temples. "And h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." He rubs his temples. "And he'll confess? To the *prosecution* too?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""But he did that shit. To get the U..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But he did that shit. To get the Union fucks killed, so they'd get the other fucks killed. Boom! Giant kill-storm. Mastermind shit -- only, like, a really old mastermind who's fucking stupid."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait -- Jean. Was there *not* a gi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- Jean. Was there *not* a giant kill-storm?"

fields.Title: You: ""It emits a chemical that makes it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It emits a chemical that makes it look *more* like the reeds."

fields.Title: You: ""I examined the insect. Up close.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I examined the insect. Up close."

fields.Title: Logic: "...if he is *that* certain. And the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...if he is *that* certain. And they are not. C'mon...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is a conversation for when we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is a conversation for when we are no longer out in the open, in Martinaise, where Evrart and Edgar Claire have ears everywhere." The lieutenant lowers his voice -- just a little.

fields.Title: Logic: "This has to be good stuff for him t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This has to be good stuff for him to backpedal out of it at first mention.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Silence. Good. The man doesn't know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Silence. Good. The man doesn't know what to say.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Silence. The wind blows."
fields.Dialogue Text: Silence. The wind blows.

fields.Title: You: ""I confiscated drugs from Cuno's da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I confiscated drugs from Cuno's dad."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You know, maybe you should become a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know, maybe you should become a beach bum? Just a thought... Because this isn't going too good.

fields.Title: Authority: "Quit while you're ahead? Or... no?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Quit while you're ahead? Or... no?

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. What he said.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. What he said."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, it was a massacre -- we got..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, it was a massacre -- we got wiped. Where the hell were *you*?!"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm just sorry.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm just sorry."

fields.Title: You: ""I did everything I could. The comp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did everything I could. The company had hired unvetted..."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Why are you not fucking shitting y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are you not fucking shitting yourselves -- what's wrong?!" He glares at the officers, who stand silently in the cold wind. In the distance a wave breaks...

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Did he just say... Insulindian pha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did he just say... Insulindian phasmid?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""POOR kid?! Fuck you, f****t! Cuno'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "POOR kid?! Fuck you, f****t! Cuno's loaded!" The boy clenches his bony fists so hard the knuckles turn white. "Can't *believe* you're not believing me..."

fields.Title: You: ""It's okay. A giant insect -- three..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's okay. A giant insect -- three metres tall -- came out of the reeds and left him in a catatonic state."

fields.Title: You: ""The biggest land invertebrate ever..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The biggest land invertebrate ever found? It's anything but funny. Also, I think it's connected to the case."

fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Incredible... Were there eggs in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Incredible... Were there eggs in the nest?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "In the mist-coloured distance over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the mist-coloured distance over the water, nothing moves. No trace of it...

fields.Title: You: ""I didn't. It's the wind. You mishe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I didn't. It's the wind. You misheard."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "This isn't going to change a lot of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This isn't going to change a lot of minds, Harry.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four kids were living in a tent on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Four kids were living in a tent on the ice. They were going to drown when it melted. It's not optimal, but the building *was* abandoned. So he put them in there. It's okay."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, honestly -- it doesn't sound..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, honestly -- it doesn't sound too important. Since it's not connected to the case -- or a giant living organism."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a possible witness in th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was a possible witness in there. And it was close to the crime scene. He was just chasing a lead and ended up advising a local shopkeeper -- it was okay."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Alright, yeah." He bites his lip...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, yeah." He bites his lip. "Cuno's in it."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Hah!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Hah!

fields.Title: Authority: "Take the advice."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take the advice.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Cryptozoology? You're giving me *c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cryptozoology? You're giving me *cryptozoology*? You say you have a motive and you use the chance to go *full crypto* on me!"

fields.Title: You: ""Its nervous system is stored in it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Its nervous system is stored in its *limbs*."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Suit, we have a *shitload* of proo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Suit, we have a *shitload* of proof. Spin it on them, pig!"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No. It's not true. It was there. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. It's not true. It was there. It was real. You remember every detail of its sounds, its movements, its presence...

fields.Title: Cuno: "He points to his skull. "But it's i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He points to his skull. "But it's in my head. In here. Cuno's *eyes* took the picture. It's RIGHT FUCKING HERE. I can't BELIEVE you're not getting this..." He grinds his teeth.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah -- I actually just got manipu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- I actually just got manipulated into it."
fields.Alternate1: "Yeah -- I probably got played."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""See -- no one cares.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "See -- no one cares."

fields.Title: You: ""Hosiannah.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hosiannah."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Damn, now it sounds like you were j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Damn, now it sounds like you were just wasting time.

fields.Title: You: ""The firefight is a trivial matter..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The firefight is a trivial matter compared to the greatest discovery of this *century*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stop being sorry for five minutes,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stop being sorry for five minutes," he says in a lowered voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then there's the... superstardom...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then there's the... superstardom. He likes to -- from time to time -- allude to being a *superstar law official*. At first I thought it was a joke, but... now I'm not so sure. He says *disco* about twenty times a day."

fields.Title: You: ""Khm... yes, the phasmid may have c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khm... yes, the phasmid may have contributed to his mental state in some way. Over the years."
